tslint.enable.description: Control whether tslint is enabled for TypeScript files or not.

tslint.jsEnable.description: Control whether tslint is enabled for JavaScript files or not.

tslint.validateWithDefaultConfig.description: Validate a file when there is only a default tslint configuration is found

tslint.configFile.description: The path to the rules configuration file

tslint.ignoreDefinitionFiles.description: Control if TypeScript definition files should be ignored

tslint.exclude.description: Configure glob patterns of file paths to exclude from linting

tslint.run.description: Run the linter on save (onSave) or on type (onType)

tslint.nodePath.description: A path added to NODE_PATH when resolving the tslint module.

tslint.autoFixOnSave.description: Turns auto fix on save on or off, or defines which rules (e.g. `no-var-keyword`) to auto fix on save.

tslint.alwaysShowRuleFailuresAsWarnings.description: Always show rule failures as warnings, independent of the tslint configuration.
